text.0: all sacred songs have magnified indra expansive as the sea.
text.1: the best of warriors borne on cars the lord the very lord of strength.
text.2: strong in thy friendship indra lord of power and might we have no fear.
text.3: we glorify with praises thee the neverconquered conqueror.
text.4: the gifts of indra from of old his saving succours never fail.
text.5: when to the praisesingers he gives the boon of substance rich in kine.
text.6: crusher of forts the young the wise of strength unmeasured was he born.
text.7: sustainer of each sacred rite indra the thunderer muchextolled.
text.8: lord of the thunder thou didst burst the cave of vala rich in cows.
text.9: the gods came pressing to thy side and free from terror aided thee.
text.10: i hero through thy bounties am come to the flood addressing thee.
text.11: songlover here the singers stand and testify to thee thereof.
text.12: the wily Śuṣṇa indra thou oerthrewest with thy wondrous powers.
text.13: the wise beheld this deed of thine now go beyond their eulogies.
text.14: our songs of praise have glorified indra who ruleth by his might.
text.15: whose precious gifts in thousands come yea even more abundantly.
